name: Elsewhere (Team Elsewhere, flankstaek, burstyfc, millerdimarem, fvkr)
name_original: Elsewhere (Team Elsewhere, flankstaek, burstyfc, millerdimarem, fvkr)
description:
Elsewhere is a dynamically generated narrative exploration game taking place in a hostile, glitched-out world. Explore a broken, ever changing realm, rife with mysterious characters to help and sinister creatures to avoid. Elsewhere is a departure from reality, where the only way back is to dive deeper into the unknown.

Team Elsewhere is:

  • Matt Miller - Game Director & Programmer - @JeT_BlAcK70
  • Ian Swain - Art/Visual Lead & Gameplay Programmer - @flankstaek

With help from:

  • Fern Ritter - Writing & Music Lead - @_fvkr_
  • Chao Fang - Lead Programmer
  • Jake Van Heemst - Lead Level & Content Designer - @zero_aurora
